titleStmt.title: A perfect description of Antichrist, and his false prophet. Wherein is plainly shewed that Oliver Cromwell was Antichrist, and John Presbiter, or John Covenanter his false prophet. Written in the yeare, MDCLIV. By Abraham Nelson. And now published with an epistle to the Kings most excellent Majestie.
titleStmt.author: Nelson, Abraham.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T.F. and are to be sold at Westminster-Hall, Fleetstreet, and the old Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A description of Antichrist.
Annotation on Thomason copy E.1044[13]: "September 16"; on E.1055[8]: Janu: 6".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
